# Example test 

 public function testFileUpload() {

        $directory = 'your_test_file_directory';

        $this->webdriver->get('http://web_url/fileUploadPage.php');

        $element = $this->webdriver->findElementBy(LocatorStrategy::id, "upload");
        $this->assertNotNull($element);

        $element->sendKeys(array($directory));
        $element->submit();
        sleep(1);

        $fileNameText = $this->isPresentText('FILE_UPLOADED_SUCCESS');
        
 }
 

------------------------------------------------------------------------
 # Implementation of isTextPresent method

 private function isTextPresent($text) {	
 
    $waiting_time = 0.5;
    $max_waiting_time = 4;
 
	$found = false;
        $i = 0;
        do {
		$html = $this->webdriver->getPageSource();
		if (is_string($html)) {
  			$found = !(strpos($html, $text) === false);
		}
		if (!$found) {
	                sleep( $waiting_time );
	                $i += $waiting_time;
		}
        } while(!$found && $i <= $max_waiting_time );
	return $found;
 }
